```{r}
library(ggplot2)
mydata <- read.table('data/E081.combined.varscan.filtered.gz', sep = '\t', header = T)
mydata$freq <- mydata$Reads2 / (mydata$Reads1 + mydata$Reads2)
ggplot(mydata) + geom_histogram(aes(x = VarFreq), binwidth = 0.1) + ggtitle('Allele frequency')
```
